segment.source: Microsoft Surface Hub administrator's guide
segment.target: Microsoft Surface Hub administrator's guide

segment.source: This guide covers the installation and administration of devices running Surface Hub, and is intended for use by anyone responsible for these tasks, including IT administrators and developers.
segment.target: This guide covers the installation and administration of devices running Surface Hub, and is intended for use by anyone responsible for these tasks, including IT administrators and developers.

segment.source: Microsoft Surface Hub administrator's guide
segment.target: Microsoft Surface Hub administrator's guide

segment.source: This guide covers the installation and administration of devices running Surface Hub, and is intended for use by anyone responsible for these tasks, including IT administrators and developers.
segment.target: This guide covers the installation and administration of devices running Surface Hub, and is intended for use by anyone responsible for these tasks, including IT administrators and developers.

segment.source: Before you power on Microsoft Surface Hub for the first time, make sure you've completed the checklist at the end of the Prepare your environment for Surface Hub section, and that you have the information listed in the Setup worksheet.
segment.target: Before you power on Microsoft Surface Hub for the first time, make sure you've completed the checklist at the end of the Prepare your environment for Surface Hub section, and that you have the information listed in the Setup worksheet.

segment.source: When you do power it on, the device will walk you through a series of setup screens.
segment.target: When you do power it on, the device will walk you through a series of setup screens.

segment.source: If you haven't properly set up your environment, or don't have the required information, you'll have to do extra work afterward making sure the settings are correct.
segment.target: If you haven't properly set up your environment, or don't have the required information, you'll have to do extra work afterward making sure the settings are correct.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Intro to Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Intro to Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: Surface Hub is an all-in-one productivity device that is intended for brainstorming, collaboration, and presentations.
segment.target: Surface Hub is an all-in-one productivity device that is intended for brainstorming, collaboration, and presentations.

segment.source: In order to get the maximum benefit from Surface Hub, your organization’s infrastructure and the Surface Hub itself must be properly set up and integrated.
segment.target: In order to get the maximum benefit from Surface Hub, your organization’s infrastructure and the Surface Hub itself must be properly set up and integrated.

segment.source: This guide describes what needs to be done both before and during setup in order to help you optimize your use of the device.
segment.target: This guide describes what needs to be done both before and during setup in order to help you optimize your use of the device.

segment.source: Physically install Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Physically install Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: The Surface Hub Readiness Guide will help make sure that your site is ready for the installation.
segment.target: The Surface Hub Readiness Guide will help make sure that your site is ready for the installation.

segment.source: You can download the Guide from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: You can download the Guide from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: It includes planning information for both the 55 and 84 devices, as well as info on moving the Surface Hub from receiving to the installation location, mounting options, and a list of what's in the box.
segment.target: It includes planning information for both the 55 and 84 devices, as well as info on moving the Surface Hub from receiving to the installation location, mounting options, and a list of what's in the box.

segment.source: Prepare your environment for Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Prepare your environment for Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: This section contains an overview of the steps required to prepare your environment so that you can use all of the features of Surface Hub.
segment.target: This section contains an overview of the steps required to prepare your environment so that you can use all of the features of Surface Hub.

segment.source: See Intro to Surface Hub for a description of how the device and its features interact with your IT environment.
segment.target: See Intro to Surface Hub for a description of how the device and its features interact with your IT environment.

segment.source: Set up Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Set up Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: Set up instructions for Surface Hub include a setup worksheet, and a walkthrough of the first-run program.
segment.target: Set up instructions for Surface Hub include a setup worksheet, and a walkthrough of the first-run program.

segment.source: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: How to manage your Surface Hub after finishing the first-run program.
segment.target: How to manage your Surface Hub after finishing the first-run program.

segment.source: Troubleshoot Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Troubleshoot Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: Troubleshoot common problems, including setup issues, Exchange ActiveSync errors.
segment.target: Troubleshoot common problems, including setup issues, Exchange ActiveSync errors.

segment.source: Appendix: PowerShell
segment.target: Appendix: PowerShell

segment.target: PowerShell scripts to help set up and manage your Surface Hub .
